scripts.build: ng build ng-canvas-painter --prod && cp projects/ng-canvas-painter/README.md dist/ng-canvas-painter/ && cp LICENSE dist/ng-canvas-painter/
scripts.publish: npm run build && npm publish dist/ng-canvas-painter
scripts.bump:minor: cd projects/ng-canvas-painter && npm version minor && cd ../..
scripts.bump:major: cd projects/ng-canvas-painter && npm version major && cd ../..
scripts.bump:patch: cd projects/ng-canvas-painter && npm version patch && cd ../..
scripts.publish:patch: npm run bump:patch && npm run publish
scripts.publish:minor: npm run bump:minor && npm run publish
scripts.publish:major: npm run bump:major && npm run publish
